Description: Large loft style studio. Second Floor. Located on Brookline Ave. 772 sqft. Great views of Kenmore Square, The Back Bay and Landsdowne Street. Unit features High Ceilings, Central A/C, Parquet Flooring, Elevators and Laundry. 50% off broker fee! Available September 1st, 2023.
